author: Jon Fingas
title: T-Mobile pins latest data breach on SIM swapping
description: T-Mobile is still suffering from data breaches, although its latest headache may be more reflective of the phone business at large. The carrier has confirmed to Bleeping Computer that a recent data breach stemmed from SIM swapping attacks. Intruders compromis…

author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
title: US officials ask AT&T, Verizon to delay 5G wireless
description: US Secretary of Transportation  Pete Buttigieg and the head of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) called on  AT&T and Verizon Communications on Friday to postpone the planned  introduction of the new 5G radio service for January 5th due to aviation saf…

author: Sam Rutherford
title: AT&T is rolling out multi-gig fiber internet to more than 70 cities
description:
Following the activation of its C-band 5G network
 last week, AT&T is now upgrading its fiber-based broadband service with two new plans that top out at 2Gbps and 5Gbps, respectively. The company says its new multi-gig fiber broadband will be available in mo…

author: Igor Bonifacic
title: US airlines warn C-Band 5G could cause 'catastrophic disruption'
description:
The airline industry claims a “catastrophic” event could unfold on Wednesday when AT&T and Verizon activate their new C-Band 5G networks. In a letter obtained by Reuters
, the CEOs of several prominent passenger and cargo airlines, including Delta, United an…

author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: AT&T agrees another 5G delay at US airports
description: Airlines have pushed for postponement, saying risks from 5G will force them to cancel flights.

author: Zacks Equity Research
title: AT&T (T) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
description: AT&T (T) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 2.63% and 1.33%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2021. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

author: Shoshana Wodinsky
title: AT&T, Verizon Delay Their 5G Rollout Plans Over Fears of Airline Interference
description: On Sunday, AT&T and Verizon heartily rejected requests from the U.S. government to delay the rollout of their 5G wireless services on the grounds that the tech could interfere with nearby airliners. Now, just a day later, it looks like the telco giants are re…

author: David McCabe
title: Verizon and AT&T Agree to Delay 5G Plans Over Airline Safety Concerns
description: The companies will wait two weeks and work with the government.

author: Samuel Contreras
title: AT&T and Dish outspend T-Mobile in Andromeda auction for mid-band spectrum
description:
What you need to know


FCC's Auction 110 concluded in November 2021 with nearly $22 billion in bids for the mid-band spectrum.
AT&T was the biggest winner with $9 billion in winning bids leading Dish Network with $7.3 billion. 
There is 100MHz available betw…

title: Discovery, T-Mobile, NYT, Texas Instruments - Reuters
description: Wall Street's main indexes were mixed in choppy trading on Friday after data pointed to weaker-than-expected job growth last month, further fueling bets of an aggressive monetary policy tightening by the Federal Reserve.

title: Salesforce, AT&T, Alibaba, Wayfair - Reuters
description: Wall Street's main indexes were mixed on Wednesday ahead of minutes from the Federal Reserve's December meeting, as investors swapped technology stocks for cyclicals that stand to benefit from a high interest rate environment.

title: Discovery, GameStop, T-Mobile, NYT - Reuters
description: Wall Street's main indexes were muted on Friday after data pointed to weaker-than-expected job growth last month, while banking shares extended gains and battered technology stocks bounced from sharp declines suffered this week.

title: Japanese shares edge higher as gains in Toyota, Sony offset tech losses - Reuters
description: Japanese shares inched up on Wednesday, as gains in Toyota Motor (7203.T) and Sony Group (6758.T) were offset by weak…

author: Samuel Contreras
title: T-Mobile reportedly closes out the year with yet another data breach
description:
What you need to know


Some T-Mobile customers have reportedly been notified of unauthorized activity on their accounts.
Internal T-Mobile documents show that "unknown actors" had access to customers' personal information including the account number, name, …

title: Japanese shares fall on Omicron concerns, SoftBank drags - Reuters
description: Japanese shares fell on Monday, with SoftBank Group (9984.T) leading declines, as concerns over the Omicron COVID-19 variant's impact offset gains in heavyweight technology stocks.

title: Toyota extends production curbs in Japan as COVID infections rise - Reuters
description: Toyota Motor Corp (7203.T) will halt more production in Japan this month because COVID-19 infections among autoworkers had slowed supplies of parts, the company said on Monday.

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Verizon, AT&T to delay 5G deployment - Reuters
description: Verizon and AT&T said late on Monday they had agreed to a two-week delay in deploying C-Band wireless spectrum, averting an aviation safety standoff that threatened to disrupt flights starting this week.  Flora Bradley-Watson reports.

title: Japan's Kirin says Myanmar unit blocked liquidation in Yangon court - Reuters
description: Japanese beverage maker Kirin Holdings' (2503.T) said on Wednesday its subsidiary in Myanmar won a dismissal in court to block liquidation by its military-linked partner.

title: US hedge fund Farallon calls on Toshiba to get two-thirds of shareholders to back break-up - Reuters
description: Farallon Capital Management on Tuesday urged Toshiba Corp (6502.T) to require the support of two-thirds of its shareholders before continuing with a controversial plan to split in three.

author: Reuters Editorial
title: AT&T, Verizon will delay some 5G deployment - Reuters.com
description: AT&T and Verizon Communications on Tuesday agreed to temporarily defer turning on some wireless towers near key airports to avert a significant disruption to U.S. flights. This report produced by Freddie Joyner.
